lead_paragraph: Georgia, responding to an intervention from a European court, on Friday suspended a ruling from a domestic court that had placed the country's biggest independent TV station under the control of a close ally of the government.
snippet: Georgia, responding to an intervention from a European court, on Friday suspended a ruling from a domestic court that had placed the country's biggest independent TV station under the control of a close ally of the government....

headline.main: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls
